items.preText: 5.15pm Welcome back, Bangladesh about to start their chase. Tamim Iqbal and Liton Das in the middle. Kemar Roach has the ball. One slip in place.
items.text: back of a length ball strays down leg, and is easily tucked down to fine leg
items.shortText: Roach to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

items.preText: Slip stays in place for Liton, but the off side cordon isn't as packed
items.text: better length and in the channel, he comes forward to defend
items.shortText: Roach to Liton Das, no run

items.text: good ball, pings him on the gloves rising from back of a length and nipping back in slightly. He stayed in his crease to defend, but the ball reared up to hit his right glove
items.shortText: Roach to Liton Das, no run

items.text: fuller length, angling into the batsman from over the wicket. Shows the full face of the bat to defend back to the bowler
items.shortText: Roach to Liton Das, no run

items.text: back of a length outside off again, rising up but he defends it from chest height in front of him
items.shortText: Roach to Liton Das, no run

items.text: length ball on off, hint of movement back in, defended into the off side
items.shortText: Roach to Liton Das, no run

items.preText: Interesting. Roston Chase's off spin from the other end. No Oshane Thomas. Slip stays for Chase too
items.text: tossed up, well wide of off, he drives it but no timing. Rolls to short cover off the toe end
items.shortText: Chase to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: nice length, tossed up more in line with the stumps, draws him forward and takes the shoulder of the bat befor e dropping forward
items.shortText: Chase to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: good ball again, in the channel, bowled quicker. Tamim lets it go through.
items.shortText: Chase to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: edge doesn't carry to slip great length and line again, tossed up and drawing the poke. He played it with soft hands though, so even though the ball gripped and turned to take the edge, it didn't carry
items.shortText: Chase to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: draws him forward again, but Tamim gets nicely behind it that time to smother it
items.shortText: Chase to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: quicker one, goes with the arm almost, too full to turn big, kept out by Tamim.
items.shortText: Chase to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: poor delivery strays down leg and it flicks the pad on the way to the fine leg fence.
items.shortText: Roach to Liton Das, 4 leg byes

items.text: better line that time, a touch full angling into the batsman, defended to cover from the crease
items.shortText: Roach to Liton Das, no run

items.text: good length again, and straightened a touch. Liton pushed at it and it goes to mid-off from the outer half of the bat
items.shortText: Roach to Liton Das, 1 run

items.text: drags it short, on leg stump, doesn't bounce. Clipped to square leg
items.shortText: Roach to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

items.text: good length outside off, he opens the face of the bat to guide it to third man
items.shortText: Roach to Liton Das, 1 run

items.text: too straight, and Tamim comes on the front foot to flick it down to deep square leg
items.shortText: Roach to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

items.preText: Chase continues. Round the wicket to Tamim
items.text: tossed up on off, but too full, and driven to long-off. Didn't time it well though
items.shortText: Chase to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

items.text: tossed up on middle stump, but very full again, he comes forward to take it on the half-volley almost and taps it down to long-on
items.shortText: Chase to Liton Das, 1 run

items.text: strays down leg and is picked off the pads to deep midwicket
items.shortText: Chase to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

items.text: tossed up on offstump, driven back gently to the bowler
items.shortText: Chase to Liton Das, no run

items.text: good ball spat off a length and took him by surprise. He was coming forward, hurriedly got his hands off the bat to keep the ball down, patting it towards short leg
items.shortText: Chase to Liton Das, no run

items.text: quicker one, and he gets the bat down in time to defend
items.shortText: Chase to Liton Das, no run

items.text: good bouncer, on target. Tamim ducks under it and lets it go through harmlessly
items.shortText: Roach to Tamim Iqbal, no run
